lead_paragraph: Chris Kunitz scored two third-period goals in the defending Stanley Cup Champion Pittsburgh Penguins' 2-0 exhibition victory over the Chicago Blackhawks on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Kunitz Scores Twice in Third, Penguins Beat Blackhawks 2-0
headline.main: Kunitz Scores Twice in Third, Penguins Beat Blackhawks 2-0

snippet: Chris Kunitz scored two third-period goals in the defending Stanley Cup Champion Pittsburgh Penguins' 2-0 exhibition victory over the Chicago Blackhawks on Wednesday night....
